Welcome to eso-downloader's documentation!
==========================================

eso-downloader is a python package which provides an easy way to download data
for a given ESO observational program ID. See :ref:`getting-started` for a quick
introduction to getting started with the ``eso-downloader`` shell command.

    :maxdepth: 2
    :caption: Contents:

    GettingStarted
    Configuring
    Reference
